direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process API documentation content but handle different input types (string content vs. location).
Both methods compare API documentation but operate on different input types (file vs. location).
Both methods involve reading API documentation from a location, making them substitutable in test scenarios.
Both methods handle similar exceptions related to reading API documentation content.
Both methods access and compare API specifications, though they differ in how the specifications are obtained.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of the OpenAPI parser.
Both methods require setting up authorization values for accessing API documentation.
This method must be invoked to read the API documentation location before comparison.
This method is invoked after reading the locations to perform the actual comparison.
Both methods handle and verify the results of API documentation comparison.
This method can be used to assert the equality of the compared API documentation.
